name: Panda Hat with black pom poms
description:
The Classic Panda Hat.  This panda hat comes with black pom poms.  The same panda hat worn by many San Francisco Giants Fans and supporters of Pablo Sandoval, aka Kung Fu Panda. This cute panda hat is perfect for any casual outing, whether it's a nice day at the park or a ski trip to the mountains. 

Need the perfect shirt to match this panda hat...check out the "I Heart Panda hat" tee shirt available for both men and women

Special shirt and hat combo available for $29 at the combo deals section

FREE SHIPPING within the United States. $10 for shipping outside the United States

name: MELKY CABRERA MELKMAN HAT
description:
Hi, this is a Melky Cabrera Hat. Known as the MELKMAN since his playing days with the New York Yankees. Now with the San Francisco Giants, the city have embraced the name. These hats will be sold at AT&T Park and all SF GIANTS DUGOUTS. THIS IS A VERY LIMITED EDITION RUN. All hats are adjustable in the back. Fits almost everyone. Get yours now before it's too late!!!

Free shipping for anywhere in the US.

Please visit all SF Giants Dugouts stores. Please check back shortly or email us for estimated arrival.
